meanings.sent1: During the soccer match, I misplayed the ball and kicked it out of bounds.
meanings.sent2: She tends to misplay the piano keys when she is nervous.
meanings.sent3: In the school play, the actor purposely misplayed his lines for comedic effect.
meanings.sent4: The magician misplayed the trick, revealing the hidden card too soon.
meanings.sent5: The young musician's nervousness caused her to misplay the notes on her flute.

meanings.definition: A mistake made during a game or performance.
meanings.sent1: The critical misplay cost the team the championship title.
meanings.sent2: The singer's misplay of the lyrics caused confusion among the audience.
meanings.sent3: The magician's unexpected misplay of the card trick left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent4: Her misplay of the chess move opened up an opportunity for her opponent to win.
meanings.sent5: The actor's misplay of the scene drew laughter from the audience.
